channel.title: My Poem
channel.description:
I woke up early one morning, The earth lay cool and stull When suddenly a tiny bird Perched on my window sill, He sang a song so lovely So carefree and so gay That slowly all my troubles Began to slip away. He sang of far off places Of laughter and of fun, It seemed his very trilling, Brought up the morning sun. I stirred beneath the covers Crept slowly out of bed, Then slowly shut the window And crushed his fucking head. I'm not a morning person
[center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnpmod.gif[/img] Don't steal other people's work.[/center]

item.title: My Poem
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:1, topic:310131”]I woke up early one morning,
The earth lay cool and stull
When suddenly a tiny bird
Perched on my window sill,
He sang a song so lovely
So carefree and so gay
That slowly all my troubles
Began to slip away.
He sang of far off places
Of laughter and of fun,
It seemed his very trilling,
Brought up the morning sun.
I stirred beneath the covers
Crept slowly out of bed,
Then slowly shut the window
And crushed his fucking head.
I’m not a morning person[/quote]

http://www.lotsofjokes.com/awful_limericks.asp

End of the page.

Banned please?

item.title: My Poem
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

I woke up early one morning,
The earth lay cool and stull
When suddenly a tiny bird
Perched on my window sill,
He sang a song so lovely
So carefree and so gay
That slowly all my troubles
Began to slip away.
He sang of far off places
Of laughter and of fun,
It seemed his very trilling,
Brought up the morning sun.
I stirred beneath the covers
Crept slowly out of bed,
Then slowly shut the window
And crushed his fucking head.
I’m not a morning person

[center] Don’t steal other people’s work.[/center]
